meanings.sent1: The hulloas of the crowd could be heard from far away.

meanings.definition: To shout or call out loudly.
meanings.sent1: He hulloas for help when he got lost in the forest.
meanings.sent2: Please don't hulloas in the library; it's a quiet place.
meanings.sent3: The coach hulloas instructions to the players during the game.
meanings.sent4: She hulloas her love for her favorite team at every match.
meanings.sent5: The teacher hulloas the answer to the question for all to hear.
